purpose: The University of Victoria is inviting applications for up to four assistant professor positions in Software Engineering and AI for a start date of January 1, 2026.
evidence_sentences: The Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science at the University of Victoria is looking to fill up to 4 research stream assistant professor positions at the intersection of Software Engineering and AI.

We invite applications from talented scholars for one of four tenure-track positions at the assistant professor level working at the intersection of Software Engineering and AI to commence January 1, 2026, or soon thereafter.
